entityId.localType: University of Melbourne Archives Accession No

biogHist.abstract: Melbourne City Mission [Records] is a collection held at the University of Melbourne Archives. Most of the records date from 1856 to 1974. The collection relates to the activities of the Mission since 1856, and includes client records, financial records, minutes, annual reports and superintendent files from its institutions for women and children.
biogHist.p: Access to records in this collection is restricted. Requests for access need to be made to the Heritage Service, Melbourne City Mission.
These are the access conditions as described in the University of Melbourne Archives finding aid:

'Permission for access in all cases must be sought, in writing, from Melbourne Citymission before researcher access is given. Additional restrictions apply to client records. (Client records are held at Series 22 and include files, registers and case cards created by various MCM agencies containing client information). Client records are sealed for 75 years from date of last action. Permission to access client records less than 75 years old may be given to family members on verification of familial connection. Permission to access client records less than 75 years old for academic research may be given if the researcher signs the UMA Deed of Understanding requiring maintenance of client confidentiality. Permission to access client records older than 75 years from date of last action may be given with Melbourne Citymission permission.'
The majority of Melbourne City Mission records in this collection at the University of Melbourne Archives date from 1856 to 1974. There are also two items dated 1981 and 1995 respectively.
The collection contains records such as minutes from committee meetings, annual reports, publications, financial records and staff diaries.
The collection includes some client records (including admissions registers) from these Homes that were run by Melbourne City Mission:

list.item: Melbourne City Mission Maternity Home, Brunswick
Melbourne City Mission Toddlers' Home, Brunswick

biogHist.p: The client records from these Homes are not complete. More information about the personal records from Homes is contained in the online listing.
Note that more records relating to Homes are held in another collection at Melbourne City Mission. The Heritage Service, Melbourne City Mission, can help people find records in either collection.
University of Melbourne Archives has an online listing, with detailed information about the records in this collection.

cpfRelation.relationEntry: Heritage Service, Melbourne Citymission - Contact Details

descriptiveNote.p: There are two collections of Melbourne Citymission records, one at the University of Melbourne Archives, and one at Melbourne Citymission's Heritage Service.

cpfRelation.relationEntry: Melbourne City Mission Maternity Home (1900 - c. 1955)
Melbourne City Mission Toddlers' Home (c. 1935 - c. 1955)
